body_content.explanation: to give someone a drug through a nebulizer (= a device that changes a liquid drug into a very fine spray that can be breathed in):
examples: After Owen was nebulized, the family was sent home.
It first began with monthly chest infections and sometimes having to be nebulized.

body_content.explanation: to change a liquid drug into a very fine spray, so it can be breathed in by a patient:
examples: A variety of natural medicines can be nebulized and delivered into the body this way.
No evidence supports the use of nebulized local anaesthetics for the treatment of breathlessness.
